requirements.description: Display hierarchical tree navigation showing all framework components (115+ skills, 30+ commands, 25+ agents, 5+ rules, 8+ hooks)
acceptance_criteria: Tree supports expand/collapse with visual indentation (2-level hierarchy minimum)
Tree displays accurate count badges (e.g., 'Skills (85)')
Categories are collapsible to reduce cognitive load

requirements.description: Implement dual-pane master-detail layout with navigation tree on left and detail content on right
acceptance_criteria: Clicking item updates detail pane within 200ms
Responsive layout: master pane collapses to drawer on mobile (<768px)
Layout persists navigation state across sessions

requirements.description: Render component details with tabbed interface showing Purpose, Examples, Options, Workflow, Traceability
acceptance_criteria: Detail pane renders markdown with syntax highlighting for code blocks
Tabs support progressive disclosure (Purpose as default)
Workflow tab displays Mermaid diagrams

requirements.description: Provide instant full-text search across all framework components with <2s response time
acceptance_criteria: Search results appear within 2 seconds of typing query
Search includes skill/command/agent names, descriptions, and keywords
Keyboard shortcut Cmd+K focuses search bar

requirements.description: Implement search filters for Type (Skill/Command/Agent), Stage (Discovery/Prototype/etc.), and Sort (Relevance/Alphabetical)
acceptance_criteria: Can filter by stage (Discovery, Prototype, Implementation, Utility)
Can filter by component type (Skill, Command, Agent, Rule, Hook)
Filters reduce visible results from 115+ to ~10-20 items

requirements.description: Enable stage-based filtering to show only Discovery, Prototype, ProductSpecs, SolArch, or Implementation components
acceptance_criteria: Components are visually grouped by stages
Stage badges are visible on every component card
Can toggle stage filter to hide irrelevant tools

requirements.description: Display stage badges (color-coded) on all component cards and tree items
acceptance_criteria: Badges use distinct colors per stage (Discovery=blue, Prototype=green, etc.)
Badges visible in tree view and card view
Stage filtering updates badge visibility

requirements.description: Provide one-click file path copy for all framework components with clipboard confirmation
acceptance_criteria: Copy Path button copies full file path to clipboard
Toast notification confirms copy action
Paths are shown in detail view (e.g., '.claude/skills/Discovery_JTBD/SKILL.md')

requirements.description: Enable favorites functionality to bookmark frequently-used components with persistence
acceptance_criteria: Every component has 'Add to Favorites' toggle
Favorites persist across sessions (localStorage)
Can reorder and remove favorites

requirements.description: Create dedicated Favorites page showing all bookmarked components with quick access
acceptance_criteria: Favorites appear in persistent sidebar or quick-access panel
Clicking favorite navigates to component in main view
Empty state message when no favorites

requirements.description: Implement light/dark theme toggle with system preference detection and persistence
acceptance_criteria: Theme toggle switches between light/dark mode
Persists preference to localStorage
Detects system preference on first load

requirements.description: Enable side-by-side comparison of similar components with feature/use case highlighting
acceptance_criteria: Related components are linked in detail view
Comparison view shows features, performance, use cases
Decision guidance: 'Use X when..., Use Y when...'

requirements.description: Render Mermaid diagrams in Workflow tabs with zoom/pan controls
acceptance_criteria: Mermaid diagrams render correctly with syntax highlighting
Users can zoom, pan diagrams
Diagrams support light/dark theme

requirements.description: Render PlantUML diagrams via Kroki integration with export capabilities
acceptance_criteria: PlantUML diagrams render via server integration
Can export diagrams (PNG, SVG, PDF)
Architecture documentation (C4 diagrams, ADRs) is browsable

requirements.description: Browse architecture documentation (C4 diagrams, ADRs, Ways of Working) in category hierarchy
acceptance_criteria: Architecture documents are searchable and filterable
Category navigation matches framework structure
Ways of Working documents are browsable by audience/category

requirements.description: Ensure tree navigation response time <200ms for expand/collapse actions
acceptance_criteria: Clicking item updates detail pane within 200ms
Tree expand/collapse animations complete within 150ms
Lazy loading for large categories

requirements.description: Search results must appear within 2 seconds of query submission
acceptance_criteria: Real-time results as user types (debounced 300ms)

Fast results validate tool responsiveness

requirements.description: Support keyboard navigation for all tree and detail pane interactions (WCAG AA)
acceptance_criteria: Arrow keys navigate tree items
Enter key expands/collapses categories

Cmd+K focuses search bar

requirements.description: Ensure WCAG 2.1 AA color contrast ratios for all text and UI elements
acceptance_criteria: Text contrast ratio ≥ 4.5:1 for normal text
Text contrast ratio ≥ 3:1 for large text (18pt+)

requirements.description: Provide mobile-optimized view with drawer navigation and touch-friendly controls
acceptance_criteria: Master pane collapses to drawer on mobile (<768px)
Touch targets ≥44px for all interactive elements
Swipe gestures to open/close drawer

requirements.description: Parse and index all framework components from .claude/ folder on startup
acceptance_criteria: Auto-discover skills from .claude/skills/
Auto-discover commands from .claude/commands/

requirements.description: Extract frontmatter metadata (name, description, stage, tags) from all markdown files
acceptance_criteria: Parse YAML frontmatter from SKILL.md files
Extract name, description, context, agent fields
Extract stage tags (Discovery, Prototype, etc.)
Gracefully handle missing frontmatter

requirements.description: Build search index from component names, descriptions, keywords, and content
acceptance_criteria: Full-text index includes all markdown content
Index updates on file system changes (watch mode)
Index optimized for <2s search response

requirements.description: Display count badges showing number of items in each category (e.g., 'Skills (85)')
acceptance_criteria: Badges show accurate item counts

requirements.description: Show info icons with hover tooltips for category descriptions

requirements.description: Handle empty search results with helpful suggestions

requirements.description: Provide 'Back to Explorer' button from search results to main view

requirements.description: Display real-world usage examples with command syntax and expected output

requirements.description: Provide settings panel for theme, layout preferences, and accessibility options
